alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 02 at 5:56PM CST until January 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 degrees expected. * WHERE...Northern Liberty and Inland Harris Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
